Main Projects

Robot Tank Controlled by a Glove
This is a project that took a year to complete. It is a tank with a robot arm, that is controlled via a wireless connection to a glove. There are sensors on the glove that detect movements of your fingers. There are also 2 buttons that change the modes of the tank (forward/reverse/ ...). The tank it self, has sensors that block him from running into walls, and closing the robot hand too hard when holding something. To read more about the tank -> tank documentry
Back-End Project (Social Website)
This is a website I built, were users can create blogs, and post data in them. The website includes a messaging system between users, a views system, profiles, comments, darkmode, password-encryption system, organized database and more. I built the website using vanilla JS for the front-end, SQL + Python (Flask & Jinja) for the back-end.
The website is very responsive (works on different divices).
click here to see the website
Front-End Project (Cooking Website)
This website I built to finish my journey to learn vanilla JS. It includes many principles I learnt such as, API, MVC coding style, Storage system, DOM manipulation, Object-Oriented-Code and more.
The code is highly organized and I recommend visiting the source code here
To see the website -> click here
